name: ALCOFORD
product_desc:
Our products are Bioethanol for medical needs; a liquor for beverage producers and protein dredges for livestock farmers.

Our customers are large pharmaceutical depots, (they supply nearly 400 pharmacies, public hospitals and medical centers)


• Private wholesalers who import thousands of ethanol casks each year and supply the entire informal distribution network with thousands of traditional alcoholic beverage producers and those from neighboring countries.

• Hospitals, clinics, private medical centers.

• Producers of: (Traditional drinks, perfumes, Liqueurs, varnishes, paints and certain cosmetic products)

• Livestock farmers.

• Carbon dioxide is intended for the brewery for the production of soft drinks.

The production of bioethanol by our company will make the product available on the market in Togo and will help to solve the problems related to the lead time.
markets: Food and Beverages, Hospitals, Cosmetics, Health Services Industry

name: Minodoo
product_desc:
Innovative technology is important only when it is apprehended by the population that appropriates it. Imagine on the Boot Camps model, the Open Source Tour (OST) are mobile workshops that bring together and initiate all newcomers to the use of free software, digital manufacturing, citizen engagement, the environment protection, collaborative and community mapping and co-creation. Since 2014, we hosted the Open Source Tour in several localities across our country Togo. We equipped these communities we visited with a digital library and computers that we co-fabricated. Indeed, we give a second life to e-waste and worn-out computers that we call JerryCan Computer.

Through this, we contribute to reducing the existing digital gap between rural and urban areas in Africa and between Africa and the rest of the world; Popularize the philosophy and use of free and open source software; Increase the awareness of Free Software for African populations and businesses.

name: Gev Consulting
product_desc:
Gev Consulting is a project incubator investing in ideas that can: 

- transform our life
- increase our social standard
- and protect our environment. 

We invest at seed stage in startups that define new markets in Sub-Saharan Africa. 

We mainly focus on sectors including: Internet, Real estates, and Agriculture.
markets: Real Estate, Mobile Commerce, Venture Capital, Internet of Things

name: HARDSOFT INTERACTIVE

See some of our works here https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=HardSoft+InterActive
